attributes.additional_details: Please just put it forward put there , because on one the citizens of the United Kingdom are suffering due to electric and gas bills and on the other they are struggling with oil price , please can you do something now now or lower the tax that the vulnerable people pay
attributes.background: I believe there is a strong matter that should given consideration at this moment in time . Regarding petrol and diesel prices are increasing incredibly in the past few weeks ,and is getting out of control we say ,

rejection.details:
The price of oil is a commercial matter for retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a related action:

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
